Interface Criterion

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BrandCriterion, InterCriterion, PriceCriterion

    public interface Criterion

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isSatisfiedBy(Vehicle v) 

    • Method Detail

      • isSatisfiedBy

        boolean isSatisfiedBy(Vehicle v)
        Parameters:
        v - the vehicle that must verify the criterion
        Returns:
        true if and only id the vehicle v is in accordance with this criterion. v is said to satisfy this criterion.
